name: Monster Arms
description: Welcome to Monster Arms, the newest concept in luxury apartment living. Our modern loft apartments include luxury amenities such as reclaimed teak flooring, high-efficiency appliances, and floor-to-ceiling windows. Relax in the saltwater infinity pool on the skydeck or enjoy growing some herbs and flowers in our community loft garden. Our concierge service ensures everything you need is within arm’s reach at Monster Arms. Please call to schedule your tour today.
